strings.Value: "Someday I will write an 'Ode Against the Field Ration.' It's not food, it's a crime against all decency."
"If someone agrees to go and fetch some meat for us, I'll... I'll dedicate the first volume of my book to them! Oh gods, even the whole book! Just bring us something fresh to eat..."
"The lot of all books is to turn to dust and be forgotten. It's the way of all things..."
"You are such a child sometimes! I'd be happy to give you my share, if we had anything to share..."
"As an author, I cannot approve of such a foolish artistic solution. On the other hand, as a hungry traveler..."
"Very well! I'll go then. Hunt, shoot some deer... Ah, ha, ha! Did you buy it? Oh, oh, your eyes are blazing, ha, ha! Don't pout, you'll have your deer... just not tonight."
